caretForecast 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

ARml()

Autoregressive forecasting using various Machine Learning models.

ARml_grouped()

Forecasting grouped time series using caret

fc_plot()

Plot a forecast or forecastARml object

forecast(<ARml>)

Forecasting an ARml object

get_var_imp()

Calculation of variable importance for forecasting model.

retail

Grouped sales data from an Australian Retailer

retail_wide

Sales data from an Australian Retailer in time series format

split_ts()

Split a time series into training and testing sets

suggested_methods()

Suggested methods for ARml

ts_plot()

Plot a ts object
